LoyaltyMembershipLifecycle.name: LoyaltyMembershipLifecycle
LoyaltyMembershipLifecycle.description: Represents information about a member's lifecycle in the loyalty program.

Comment.description: The comments for the member's lifecycle event.

EffectiveEndDate.description: The date till when the member's lifecycle event is effective.

EffectiveEndDateTime.description: The start date and time of the lifecycle event.

EffectiveStartDate.description: The date from when the member's lifecycle event is effective.

EffectiveStartDateTime.description: The start date and time of the lifecycle event.

ExternalIdentifier.description: The external identifier of the member's lifecycle event.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

LoyaltyMemberTierId.description: The ID of the loyalty member tier associated with the loyalty membership lifecycle.

LoyaltyProgramMemberId.description: The loyalty program member whose lifecycle is tracked.

MembershipStatus.description: Required. Specifies the status of the member's lifecycle event.

MembershipType.description: Required. Specifies the type of lifecycle event of the member.

OrderItemId.description: The order associated with the lifecycle event.
